channel.title: Hi I'm Shane and bootstrapping clickpost.io as a side project
channel.description:
I enjoy creating web projects, which genrally lead to more web projects. That's where ClickPost comes in.
SEO was always an afterthought, and I didn't understand what sort of black magic was occurring to make some of my sites do well while others didn't. I always set up Google Search Console for each site, but didn't always understand it or remember to check out the data.
ClickPost solves this problem by sending weekly Search Console reports for site owners, and I recently added an agency plan to send white label reports to clients.
Please let me know what you think! Thanks.
